about_the_game:
Mirror World is an uncompromising cyberpunk game of science, sex, and intrigue. You begin playing a too-real prototype VR Game. Thrust into leading a group of friends and cyberpunks you must learn to survive while building a harem, battling corporate and government overlords and sentient AI systems.

Mirror World is an adult visual novel set in a futuristic cyberpunk world. You begin by playing a prototype VR cyberpunk game with friends and your sisters. Heavy on story, lore, and character building with animations Mirror World transitions between the real world and the cyberpunk world of the game.

Your cyber and real life are merging unexpectedly, impacting your relationships with fellow gamers and game inhabitants. You pursue romances with fellow gamers and characters (human, android, robot, and other species) in the real and game world building a harem as you go.

Enter an unforgiving and dangerous world populated with corrupt Governments and corporations, sentient AI, bands of mercenaries, and ultra-rich players. Gather resources and power to survive and thrive or collaborate. Your choices will determine your path. You can pursue romances with your favorites (human, android, alien, you name it), or all of them.

Mirror World offers a story set in a dystopian futuristic world.

  • Build a harem from a cast of individual characters with distinct personalities, motivations, and attributes.
  • Offers many high-quality animated sex scenes with build-up, creativity, and positions.
  • Many non-sexual animated scenes.
  • Achievements with bonus scenes and renders.
  • Lore codex detailing the game world.
  • Dialogue choices that let you guide your experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Mirror World is an adult, erotic, Visual Novel. It contains adult language, alcohol usage, nudity, sexual themes, sexual situations, graphic sexual content, and violence.
